x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Many UK council tenants struggle to report issues like damp, leaks, or heating faults in their homes. Reports are often made via phone calls or emails and can get lost or delayed, leaving residents in unsafe conditions and increasing long-term repair costs for councils.

x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

Use ServiceNow Customer Service Management for case handling, Flow Designer for automated routing to the right maintenance team, and Mobile App Builder to let tenants submit issues via phone. Performance Analytics dashboards could give councils insights into housing quality trends.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Integration with council housing databases, contractor scheduling tools, and optional SMS/email notification services (Twilio or SendGrid).

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Ensuring all tenants have digital access, verifying genuine housing reports, and coordinating responses with third-party maintenance contractors.
